name: HSP_CLP_BND_EPSD_INFO
description: Holds rows for every claim line / linked bundled episode combination on a claim.

columns.name: CLAIM_PRINT_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the claim print record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: BND_EPSD_EPISODE_ID
columns.description: Holds the bundled episode record that is linked to the related claim line.

columns.name: BND_EPSD_CLAIM_LINE
columns.description: Holds the claim line that is linked to the related bundled episode.
